title: Try not to use plastic items at all for one day
description: You must not use any plastic products at all today . Try to think about some alternatives that you can use. Begin to do something, even small, to help our planet. Do your best and good luck!

title: Reuse plastic bottles that you have
description: Once washed and rinsed they can be reused many times. Doing so will help your planet and reduce your plastic footprint. Do your best!!!
